definition: any of various plants of the genus Froelichia found in sandy soils and on rocky slopes in warmer regions of America
details:
noun
- any of various plants of the genus Froelichia found in sandy soils and on rocky slopes in warmer regions of America
- an American everlasting having foliage with soft wooly hairs and corymbose heads with pearly white bracts
= synonyms: pearly everlasting
